bill.title: Oil and gas severance tax; reallocate to State Highway Fund.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-25-506, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Distribution Of Oil Severance Taxes, Other Than Amounts Credited To The Trust Fund Created In Section 206a, Mississippi Constitution Of 1890, And To Phase In The Revision Over A Four-year Period; To Provide That The Total Amount Of Such Revenues Shall Be Deposited In The State General Fund During The First Year; To Provide That Such Revenues Shall Be Deposited In Part In The State General Fund And In Part In The State Highway Fund During The Second And Third Years; To Provide That The Total Amount Of Such Revenues Shall Be Deposited In The State Highway Fund During The Fourth Year And Each Year Thereafter; And For Related Purposes.
